channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Spectra

item.title: CVE-2020-36656|2024-08-04T17:30:08.559Z -- unknown -- spectra
item.description: The Spectra WordPress plugin before 1.15.0 does not sanitize user input as it reaches its style HTML attribute, allowing contributors to conduct stored XSS attacks via the plugin's Gutenberg blocks.
